heading: Steps to becoming a sponsor
description: We prefer to talk directly with each of our potential sponsor as we hope that our core values align and that we are truly a fitting match.

01.step: Send us a message on our Discord server
01.step_description: We are active on our Discord and it’s the best way to stay in touch with us and follow our work.

02.step: Apply as a sponsor by filling out a form
02.step_description: If our preliminary chat goes well according to both you and us, we’ll give you a link to a form that you can fill out.

03.step: Wait for confirmation (and our huge thanks!)
03.step_description: We will contact you via Discord or email and let you know if everything is in order for the sponsorship.
